title: MoxieTV episode #4
body: MoxieTV episode #4 went live last night, so do yourself a favor and go check it out! Other than that... I need to go eat some cereal for lunch.
author: Dan

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Great episode of MoxieTV. The music fit perfectly too. So for the Three Burials episode I think Dan should be BURIED ALIVE after saying "You stay classy Springfield." What do you think?

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Er, how come my little URL link doesn't send me to the right place? How strange.

comments.author: Derek
comments.body: Why can't I download it? The connection here is too slow for streaming of any sort to work (I tried with this episode and only the sound actually moved forward as the picture stayed in place). Plus, I've been saving them in my own personal archives :-)

comments.author: justin
comments.body: oops... i forgot about the downloadable version.  I'll upload that later tonight!  Thanks for the heads up.

comments.author: justin
comments.body: mmk, the downloadable version has been posted.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: Could you have picked a creepier picture for the Night Watch info section? It looks like he's making out with the owl.

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
im like "i think justin's drunk"  
and he was

good makeup job nicole

unimportant note: sometimes i deliver pizza to those small disgusting strip clubs.... of course getting paid in all ones (rarely ever get a tip from those places btw) .... i tend to exchange that money with the cash register at work... right before washing my hands before my next delivery

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
Grrreat episode.

My nose bleeds on command.  I would have made a good stand in.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: You should sell Choxie at the Moxie!

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
Choxie WOULD be a good fit, since there's been a chocolate theme of late.

I like both pieces of music in the Nightwatch trailer.  The first was off the Trainspotting soundtrack.  But the second?  Hmmmm....
Paging Dr. Copeland?
